about_the_game:
Every RPG is just as good as the characters you can play or interact with. And if you are looking for some more possible options to illustrate such a cast, you came to the right place! The 6th iteration of the RPG character packs brings you a total of 16 heroines to spice up your roster!

This pack has lots of options and classes including Blade Girl, Bunny Fighter, Elemental Elf Assassin, Forest Guardian, Healer, plus more!

Check out these cool ladies, you might want to have them in your game!

Features:

* 16 new RPG-style characters
* Includes battlers, SV battlers, portrait, facesets with various emotions

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
